content: unleash your creativity with this versatile small crochet square motif pattern perfectly crafted to work up swiftly in just four rounds this motif is the ideal addition to your crochet repertoire whether you re envisioning chic handbags cozy cardigans snug slippers or warm blankets this motif seamlessly fits into any project **materials ** yarn dk weight scrap yarn hook us size g 4 00mm yarn needle scissors **techniques ** magic_ring chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet 2 double_crochet cluster 2dc-cluster 3 double_crochet cluster 3dc-cluster invisible join
